statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT location, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM weather_data GROUP BY location ORDER BY num_records DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-10-05';
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_temperature_range FROM planting_schedule WHERE optimal_humidity_range LIKE '%40%';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_temperature_range FROM planting_schedule WHERE optimal_temperature_range BETWEEN '20' AND '30' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation < 5 AND humidity > 70 ORDER BY date ASC, humidity DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY temperature DESC, date ASC;
SELECT plant_name, watering_schedule FROM planting_schedule ORDER BY LENGTH(watering_schedule) DESC, plant_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT location_id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT location_id, date, precipitation FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plant_id, season, optimal_temperature_range FROM planting_schedule WHERE season = 'Winter';
SELECT planting_date, harvest_date, yield FROM planting_history WHERE location_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT season, COUNT(plant_id) FROM planting_schedule WHERE season = 'Spring' GROUP BY season;
SELECT * FROM planting_history WHERE harvest_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY yield DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plant_id, location_id, planting_date, harvest_date, yield FROM planting_history WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY planting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM WeatherRecords WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT location, precipitation FROM WeatherRecords ORDER BY precipitation DESC
SELECT plant_name, optimal_sunlight_hours FROM PlantingSchedules WHERE optimal_sunlight_hours >= 6
SELECT * FROM PlantingHistory WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT location, forecast_date, forecast_temperature FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT record_id, location, temperature FROM WeatherRecords WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT plant_name, soil_type FROM PlantingSchedules WHERE optimal_sunlight_hours >= 6 ORDER BY plant_name DESC
SELECT plant_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM PlantingHistory WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecasts WHERE location = 'New York' AND forecast_temperature < 20 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC
SELECT location, precipitation FROM WeatherRecords WHERE precipitation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY precipitation DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type, optimal_temperature FROM PlantingSchedule ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, date, predicted_temperature, predicted_humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE predicted_temperature < 20;
SELECT planting_date, harvest_date FROM PlantingHistory WHERE plant_name = 'Tomato';
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, planting_date FROM PlantingHistory WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT plant_name, optimal_temperature, optimal_humidity FROM PlantingSchedule WHERE plant_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY plant_name ASC, optimal_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE predicted_temperature < 20 AND predicted_humidity > 70 ORDER BY date ASC, predicted_temperature DESC;
SELECT date, moisture_level FROM SoilMoisture WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
